alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:49PM EST until February 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Rain changing to mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch, sleet accumulations around one quarter to one half of an inch and ice accumulations up to a light glaze. * WHERE...Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
